title: Aarya Emerald & Diamond Stud Earrings
features: These stunning stud earrings feature a radiant, floral-inspired design. A central oval-cut emerald is surrounded by a dazzling array of brilliant-cut diamonds, meticulously set to maximize sparkle. The design showcases an elegant blend of traditional floral motifs with a modern aesthetic.
occasions: and elegant evening wear. Suitable for modern and traditional attire.
description: Exquisitely crafted using high-quality materials and featuring a timeless design, these emerald and diamond earrings are a true statement piece. The Hyderabadi polish enhances the gold's luster, adding to their luxurious appeal. The classic design ensures these earrings can be cherished for generations.
